For those of you who don't understand how to get the maps in-game:

Click 'Start' > 'Computer' > 'Local Dick (C:) > 'Program Files' > 'Microsoft Games' > 'Halo CE' > 'Maps' > and then you just extract to that folder every map you wish to play.
